dc_description_s: This dataset locates facilities where municipalities around Cook County have opened cooling centers for area residents as temperatures start to rise. Residents who need to seek shelter should contact the center first to verify it is open. Please refer to this link for future updates: https://datacatalog.cookcountyil.gov/dataset/Cook-County-Cooling-Centers-Map/dnn9-esge
dc_creator_sm: Cook County Department of Homeland Security and Emergency Management
